titleStmt.title: The case of the Quakers concerning oaths defended as evangelical in answer to a book, entituled, The case of the Quakers relating to oaths stated by J.S.
titleStmt.author: Whitehead, George, 1636?-1723.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to George Whitehead. cf. NUC pre-1956.
